turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to order my usual.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where do you want it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks, the one in Wilkes-Barre by my house. Order me a hazelnut latte with skim milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, let me put you on hold and I will order it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok - I ordered you a large latte with french vanilla and skim milk. It will be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Why do I keep you around?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK - I fixed it. They said it would be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok - text me the receipt and confirmation number.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I just texted it to you. Did you get it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes - Thanks. Make sure you get my laundry and I'll meet you at the office.
